data.name: Featured_Heading
data.value: Featured articles

data.name: Hero_Content
data.value: The documentation and tutorials here get you started using this fully-managed NoSQL document database-as-a-service. Quickly create and query schema-free databases, develop .NET, Node.js, Java, Javascript, or Python apps using robust code samples, access your data using the RESTful HTTP interface, or go to our playground to run queries against live data.

data.value: DocumentDB documentation {0}

data.value: Learn how to use this fully-managed, scalable, NoSQL document database service

data.value: Documentation and tutorials to help you use Azure DocumentDB, a NoSQL service, to build applications that query and store JSON data using Javascript.

data.value: View more DocumentDB videos

data.value: Videos

data.name: Develop_Heading_JAVA
data.value: Develop a Java application with DocumentDB

data.name: Develop_SubHeading_JAVA
data.value: This tutorial shows you how to use the Azure DocumentDB service to store and access data from a Java application hosted on Azure Websites.

data.name: Explore_Heading_INDEXING
data.value: How indexing works

data.name: Explore_SubHeading_INDEXING
data.value: Understand how indexing works in DocumentDB and learn how to configure the indexing policy.

data.name: Reference_Heading_JAVA_SDK
data.value: Java SDK Reference

data.name: Reference_SubHeading_JAVA_SDK
data.value: Reference documentation for the Java API supported by DocumentDB.

data.name: Develop_Heading_Hadoop
data.value: Run a Hadoop job using DocumentDB and HDInsight

data.name: Develop_Heading_ResManager
data.value: Deploy DocumentDB and an Azure website using an Azure Resource Manager Template

data.name: Develop_SubHeading_Hadoop
data.value: Tutorial which shows how to run Apache Hive, Apache Pig and Apache Hadoop MapReduce jobs on Azure HDInsight with the DocumentDB Hadoop connector. We will use DocumentDB for both the data source and destination for Hadoop jobs.

data.name: Develop_SubHeading_ResManager
data.value: Tutorial which shows how to use a template to deploy and integrate DocumentDB, an Azure website and a sample web application.

data.name: Manage_Heading_DocExplorer
data.value: View, edit, create and upload JSON documents using the DocumentDB Document Explorer

data.name: Manage_Heading_QueryExplorer
data.value: Create, edit and run SQL queries against a DocumentDB collection using Query Explorer

data.name: Manage_SubHeading_DocExplorer
data.value: Tutorial which shows how to view, edit, create and upload JSON documents with DocumentDB.

data.name: Manage_SubHeading_QueryExplorer
data.value: Tutorial which shows how to run SQL queries against a DocumentDB collection. Includes how to navigate results via a browser and how to troubleshoot syntax errors.

data.name: Develop_Heading_Indexer
data.value: Connecting DocumentDB with Azure Search using indexers

data.name: Develop_SubHeading_Indexer
data.value: Step-by-step info about how to integrate Azure DocumentDB with Azure Search without having to write code to maintain indexing infrastructure.

data.name: Plan_Heading_Model
data.value: Modeling data in DocumentDB

data.name: Plan_Heading_Partition
data.value: Partitioning data in DocumentDB

data.name: Plan_Heading_Secure
data.value: Securing access to DocumentDB data

data.name: Plan_Subheading_Model
data.value: Considerations for modeling data including embedding data, referencing it and hybrid data models.

data.name: Plan_Subheading_Partition
data.value: Considerations for partitioning data including collections, types of partitioning (range, lookup, hash) and developing a partitioned application.

data.name: Plan_Subheading_Secure
data.value: Overview of access control concepts for DocumentDB and info about master and read-only keys, resource tokens and permissions. Includes code snippets.
